metadata.title: CVE-2020-12279 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libgit2 before 0.28.4 and 0.9x before 0.99.0.checkout.c mishandles equivalent filenames that exist because of NTFS shortnames. This may allow remote code execution when cloning a repository. Thisissue is similar to CVE-2019-1353.

criterions.comment: libgit2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
